message: Let's split it 50/50, Bob. What do you say?
You're being too generous, let's try to negotiate!
I'm willing to give you a slightly higher share, but I'm not going to give away all the power. What do you think?
I'll take a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to back down now!
I'm willing to compromise further, but I'm not giving up yet. Meet me in the middle?
I'm not budging, but I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share than my previous offer
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still willing to negotiate. Can we find a compromise?
I'm starting to get a bit desperate, but I'm still not giving up on a better deal
I'm getting desperate, but I'm still trying to get a fair deal. This is my last real offer. Take it or leave it.
I'm not going to back down now, I'm taking what I can get!
